synopsis.text: As fate would have it, high school sweethearts Mio and Kujo cross paths once more at a class reunion. Kujo, now a respectable priest managing his family's temple, seems far removed from Mio's romantic aspirations. Overwhelmed by the unexpected encounter, Mio drowns her sorrows in drink, only to find an unexpected savior in Kujo. As the night unfolds, the pair find themselves entangled in a passionate encounter, blurring the lines between the sacred and the profane. As their relationship evolves, Mio grapples with the moral implications of their connection, leaving viewers eager to uncover the future of this unconventional romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
